alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 11:10PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of southern Reno and Kingman Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds associated with decaying thunderstorms over Pratt, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingman, Pretty Prairie, Norwich, Cunningham, Turon, Nashville, Murdock, Waterloo, Willowdale, Zenda, Spivey, Cleveland, Penalosa, Cheney Lake, Mt Vernon, Kingman Airport, Rago and Cheney State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
